title: It Finally Happened

replies.body:
Probably because he's literally the only ADC anyone will ever possibly give you.

I find it ironic that the "Flavor Gamemode of the Week" has a stricter meta than a regular game

> [{quoted}](name=Castanean,realm=EUW,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=AwHIgAW9,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-02-13T02:05:14.564+0000)
>
> Probably because he's literally the only ADC anyone will ever possibly give you.

Unless they give you nothing BUT ADC's.

I love me some Urgot.  He's not bad, ppl just don't know how to play champs that aren't the 15 being spammed that week, and he's NEVER in that group.  They better not nerf big sexy because some whining kids lost to him in nemesis and remembered that he's a real champion not just a cardboard cutout of one nailed to a stick.
Him and Yorick, and they are both strong.

Literally every game i've played so far i told my team "DO NOT GIVE THEM URGOT" 
He is an adc, and no matter how you look at it Urgot does damage.

Urgot complaint threads should just be translated to this:
"WAHHHH!  I gave him Urgot and he played the game like it was a real champion, no fair I wanted a 4v5!"
Grab your bibles and spray for locusts the apocalypse is nigh
